text: @AndrewYang The freaking 45’s total ignorance dismissal the death of Americans lives, yet only concerned his re-election by calling the COVID19 as Democrats new hoax on March 2nd. All these months passed, the death number keeps rolling up, how insane is his mental illness of only about him.
